text: Hi Laurence! My code actually includes both "input" and "change" already but i tried switching it to ".change" and it didnt solve the issue.

AH, just came up with a solution for those who are curious. After selecting a date on the datepicker, it automatically focuses out, so I used the .focusout event to trigger the code I wanted to run. Less of a solution and more of a workaround but it does the trick! Still curious to know why it isnt triggering the "change" event if anyone knows.

How odd! I forgot to attach my example <https://codepen.io/laurence_prodo/pen/MWwejKj>

Glad you got it working in the end! :+1:
